author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Two-day job fair

Over 40 companies from various sectors will participate in a mega job fair organised by Sree Sakthi Engineering College on March 19 and 20. Freshers or experienced candidates who have completed bachelor’s or master’s degree in arts and science courses, professional courses, final year college students and even those who have completed SSLC can take part in the fair to be held on the premises of the institution in Karamadai. There is no entry fee. For details call – 04254-295000, 9042512299 or 9629221239.
title: Briefly (Two Items)
